drug.name: Cyclopentamine
drug.description: Cyclopentamine is a sympathomimetic alkylamine, classified as a vasoconstrictor. Cyclopentamine was an over the counter treatment for nasal congestion in Europe and Australia. It has been widely discontinued due to the safety, effectiveness, and availability of a similar drug, propylhexedrine.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as dialkylamines. These are organic compounds containing a dialkylamine group, characterized by two alkyl groups bonded to the amino nitrogen.

atc-code.level: DECONGESTANTS AND OTHER NASAL PREPARATIONS FOR TOPICAL USE

drug-interaction.name: Sildenafil
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Sildenafil is combined with Cyclopentamine.
